thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ger_in_clare
title: Great location
text: All the usual Premier Inn characteristics apply: great bed, generic decorations, good shower. But the location is the standout for this particular hotel. Really close to a part of London we really hadn't explored before, and only a short walk to the markets at Petticoat and Brick Lane on a gorgeous sunny Sunday morning. Nice, friendly staff, and only the wifi could be improved, really.
